mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.* , rownum AS rn FROM (SELECT * FROM board_tbl ORDER BY b_num DESC) A ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_tbl (b_num, u_id, b_title, b_contents, b_category, b_dateposted, b_updateDate, b_views, b_recommend, b_image) VALUES (SELECT NVL(MAX(b_num)+1,1), #{u_id}, #{b_title}, #{b_contents}, #{b_category}, sysdate, NULL, 0, 0, #{b_image});
